channel.title: React.js Pixel Streaming for Unreal Engine Blog
channel.description: React.js Pixel Streaming for Unreal Engine Blog

item.title: web3.js
item.description: MetaEditor.io demonstrates how to integrate web3.js into Unreal Engine web application.
item.content:encoded:
MetaEditor.io demonstrates how to integrate web3.js into Unreal Engine web application.

With MetaEditor you can use cryptocurrency inside the game space.

https://ps.metaeditor.io/

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Published real-time gallery with projects built on Unreal Engine.
item.content:encoded:
Published real-time gallery with projects built on Unreal Engine.

https://ps.metaeditor.io/gallery

item.title: New demos
item.description: We have added a new example that perfectly demonstrates the capabilities of Unreal Engine

item.title: MetaClient
item.description: Introducing MetaClient, a tool to run the Pixel Streaming server of Unreal Engine on your local machine
item.content:encoded:
Introducing MetaClient, a tool to run the Pixel Streaming server of Unreal Engine on your local machine

Signalling Server for Pixel Streaming

item.title: MetaEditor v.2
item.description: We have released a new version of MetaEditor. Abandoned MUI and Nextjs, leaving only the essentials. Not in production yet, but stable.
item.content:encoded:
We have released a new version of MetaEditor. Abandoned MUI and Nextjs, leaving only the essentials. Not in production yet, but stable.

https://github.com/markolofsen/metaeditor/tree/dev-v2

item.title: MetaPlugin Release
item.content:encoded:
Great news!

We have released a plugin for Unreal Engine to connect MetaEditor to your projects.

https://github.com/markolofsen/metaplugin-pixel-streaming

item.title: Vacancy
item.description: We are looking for a cool seller.
item.content:encoded:
We are looking for a cool seller.

MetaEditor.io — The web platform for the business metaverses.

item.title: Product Hunt
item.description: We have published the MetaEditor project on Product Hunt and we really need your support.
item.content:encoded:
We have published the MetaEditor project on Product Hunt and we really need your support.

We remind you that MetaEditor is Unreal Engine app's in Browser.

If you have a minute — vote for us or leave a comment.

item.title: Pixel Streaming Video
item.description: The Open Source MetaEditor offers a complete set of tools for professional developing and running the Unreal Engine’s Applications in browsers.
item.content:encoded: The Open Source MetaEditor offers a complete set of tools for professional developing and running the Unreal Engine’s Applications in browsers.

item.title: We have launched a portal
item.description: We have launched a portal for managing Unreal Engine projects
item.content:encoded:
We have launched a portal for managing Unreal Engine projects

portal.metaeditor.io

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: MetaEditor.io — helps integrate Unreal Engine v.5 in the browser. Allows you to send commands and get callbacks from the stream server with launched Unreal Engine.
item.content:encoded:
MetaEditor.io — helps integrate Unreal Engine v.5 in the browser. Allows you to send commands and get callbacks from the stream server with launched Unreal Engine.

Connects to running STUN and TURN Servers.
